Top-Level Mailing Lists

This page lists the primary NetBeans mailing lists. To subscribe or unsubscribe, click the buttons and send a blank email to the appropriate address below. From here you can also browse the list archives online.

  • Newsletters and Support Channels
  • User Interest Lists - working with NetBeans
  • Development Lists - working on NetBeans
  • Community-Related Lists
  • Lists in Your Language

Looking for NetBeans IDE support? First subscribe to the nbusers list, then post your question there. This is how you get free support! There are also many other NetBeans Support Resources.

Lists, Newsgroups, and Forums

Newsletters and Support Channels

Latest News and Support for users of the NetBeans IDE. Beginners start here - welcome!

nbannounce@netbeans.org
High-level monthly announcements and major release notifications. This is not a discussion list and it's not open to public posting. Traffic is very low (1-2 posts / month).
Recommended for: Anyone interested in NetBeans releases.
Average Posts / week* : < 1
Browse Archives
 
 
nbweekly@netbeans.org
The weekly NetBeans newsletter keeps you up-to-date with the NetBeans community. This is not a discussion list and it's not open to public posting. Traffic is very low (4 posts / month).
Recommended for: NetBeans users and developers interested in a short weekly digest of recent news, technical articles, tips & tricks.
Average Posts / week* : 1
Browse Archives
 
 
nbusers@netbeans.org
The main NetBeans user support list. General discussion of NetBeans use. This support channel is the place to ask for help and to help others.
Recommended for: General support and discussion, for NetBeans users of all levels. Developers and experienced users are encouraged to subscribe and help out newcomers.
Average Posts / week* : < 10
Browse Archives
 
 

*Posts/week - average weekly traffic over the last 5 weeks.

User Interest Lists - working with NetBeans

Special interest lists for NetBeans Users categorized by technology

dev@platform.netbeans.org
NetBeans Platform API discussion and support list.
Recommended for: Anyone creating plugins for the NetBeans IDE, or developing RCP applications on top of the NetBeans Platform.
Browse Archives
 
 
nbj2ee@netbeans.org
Java EE development discussion and support list. How to use NetBeans IDE for developing Java Web and Enterprise applications.
Recommended for: NetBeans users doing Java EE development.
Browse Archives
 
 
nbentpack@netbeans.org
SOA Development discussion and support list. How to use NetBeans IDE to develop BPEL, SOA, and composite applications.
Recommended for: NetBeans users doing SOA development.
Browse Archives
 
 
users@cnd.netbeans.org
C/C++ development discussion and support list.
Recommended for: NetBeans users doing C/C++ development.
Browse Archives
 
 
users@mobility.netbeans.org
Mobile and embedded development discussion and support list. Discuss Java ME (CDC, CLDC) and developing for mobile phones, Java Card, or other portable devices.
Recommended for: NetBeans users doing Java Mobile development.
Browse Archives
 
 
users@ruby.netbeans.org
Ruby, Rails, and JRuby development discussion and support list.
Recommended for: NetBeans users doing Ruby development.
Browse Archives
 
 
users@php.netbeans.org
PHP development discussion and support list.
Recommended for: NetBeans users doing PHP development.
Browse Archives
 
 
users@javafx.netbeans.org
JavaFX development discussion and support list.
Recommended for: NetBeans users doing JavaFX development.
Browse Archives
 
 
nbwebclient@netbeans.org
Client-side web application development discussion and support list. How to work with HTML5/CSS3/JavaScript applications and related technologies in NetBeans IDE.
Recommended for: NetBeans users developing HTML5 web applications.
Browse Archives
 
 

Developer Lists - working on NetBeans

Lists for those working on NetBeans itself. Also see the Build Process Lists.

nbdev@netbeans.org
NetBeans Development: The main NetBeans developers' mailing list. Day-to-day discussion of NetBeans development and planning.
Recommended for: Anyone working on the NetBeans codebase, or interested in doing so.
Browse Archives
 
 
api-changes@netbeans.org
API Review: Join this discussion list to be notified of architecture reviews and changes in the code base as reported by the verification framework.
Recommended for: People who what to be up-to-date about changes in the NetBeans architecture and, possibly, influence it.
Browse Archives
 
 
netfix@netbeans.org
NetFIX Program: Discussion list for participants in the community's NetFIX program.
Recommended for: Anyone contributing patches to the NetBeans IDE.
Browse Archives
 
 
nbui@netbeans.org
NetBeans User Interface: Discussions on the graphical appearance of the IDE, its key bindings, usability, workflow issues. This is not a support forum.
Recommended for: People interested in the usability of the IDE and in helping to improve it.
Browse Archives
 
 

Community Mailing Lists

Broader-scope community related lists

nbdiscuss@netbeans.org
Discuss the NetBeans open-source project and get in contact with the NetBeans governance board. This list is not intended for support questions or enhancement requests.
Browse Archives
 
 
netcat@netbeans.org
NetCAT Program: Discussion list for participants in the community's NetCAT (NetBeans Community Acceptance) program.
Recommended for: Any community member interested in beta-testing the NetBeans IDE.
Browse Archives
 
 
nbmarketing@netbeans.org
NetBeans Marketing: Get in contact with NetBeans evangelists.
Recommended for: Conference hosts, JUGs, students, teachers, and anyone interested in promoting the NetBeans project worldwide.
Browse Archives
 
 
nbdocs_feedback@usersguide.netbeans.org
NetBeans Documentation: Discussions on the NetBeans IDE help system, the CommunityDocs program, and all Docs & Support web content.
Recommended for: Anyone who wants to contribute new NetBeans tutorials, or improve existing ones.
Browse Archives
 
 
webteam@netbeans.org
NetBeans Web Team: Feedback on the NetBeans infrastructure and website, including news, wiki, forums, and mailing lists.
Recommended for: Anyone who wants to help improve the netbeans.org website.
Browse Archives
 
 
nbedu@netbeans.org
NetBeans in Education: Share info on teaching computer science and developer training with the NetBeans IDE.
Recommended for: CS teachers, university professors, professionals looking for training, and anyone interested in Java in education. See also edu.netbeans.org
Browse Archives
 
 
nbjobs@netbeans.org
NetBeans Jobs: NetBeans-related job forum, both wanted and offered. This list is moderated, it's not a general purpose jobs forum! Job postings and resumes not relevant to NetBeans will not be approved.
Recommended for: Employers seeking NetBeans skills, and NetBeans developers seeking jobs.
Browse Archives
 
 

Lists in Your Language

Use of the English lists is recommended, but in cases where that is not possible, the following localised lists are available. Each list has a "community leader" who voluntarily acts as a liason between their list members and the wider english community, for example by translating and cross-posting anything of interest (though this is not expected for normal day-to-day traffic).

nbdiscuss_es@netbeans.org
Esta lista esta recomendada para los miembros de la comunidad NetBeans que hablan Español. El tema general de discusion aqui es el IDE NetBeans.
Archivo
 
 Darse de Alta
Darse de Baja
 
nbdiscuss_fr@netbeans.org
Liste de discussion en français où vous pouvez discuter entre francophones au sujet de l'EDI NetBeans.
Recommandé pour: les membres francophones de la communauté NetBeans
Consulter Archives
 
 S'inscrire
Se désinscrire
 
nbdiscuss_it@netbeans.org
Discussione generica su NetBeans - uso, comunità, sviluppo, in italiano.
Suggerito per: Chiunque sia interessato a NetBeans e parli italiano.
Consulta gli archivi
 
 Iscriviti
Annulla l'iscrizione
 
nbdiscuss_ja@netbeans.org
製品や web ページへのフィードバック、使用法などに関するトピックの共有や提供、 既存の機能等に関するディスカッションを日本語で行うためのメーリングリストです。
こんな方々に: すでに NetBeans を使用している、使い始めたばかり、 フィードバックを送信してみようと思っている、最新のリリース情報を共有したい等々、 幅広いユーザー向けのリストです。
アーカイブを参照
 
 購読
購読中止
 
nbdiscuss_pl@netbeans.org
Lista ta jest polecana członkom społeczności użytkowników NetBeans, którzy znają język polski. Głównym tematem dyskusji jest NetBeans IDE.
Przeglądaj archiwum
 
 Zapisz się
Wypisz się
 
nbdiscuss_pt@netbeans.org
Esta lista é recomendada para membros da comunidade NetBeans que falam português. Nela são discutidos assuntos gerais sobre o NetBeans IDE.
Ver mensagens arquivadas

nbdiscuss_ru@netbeans.org
Рассылка для русскоговорящих пользователей и разработчиков NetBeans. Место для общего обсуждения NetBeans, от использования до разработки приложений на её основе.
Рекомендовано для: Русскоязычной части сообщества NetBeans.
Просмотр архивов
 
 Подписаться
Отписаться
 
nbdiscuss_zh@netbeans.org
中文 NetBeans 综合讨论 － 用法、社区以及开发等方方面面。 推荐人选: 对 NetBeans 感兴趣且说中文的任何人。
